"},"$:/core/modules/editor/operations/text/save-all.js":{"title":"$:/core/modules/editor/operations/text/save-all.js","created":"20240316102143957","modified":"20240316103148035","module-type":"texteditoroperation","tags":"全选并保存 首行缩进和空行","type":"application/javascript","text":"/*\ title: $:/core/modules/editor/operations/text/save-all.js type: application/javascript module-type: texteditoroperation Text editor operation to select the entire text and save it to a specified tiddler and field \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; exports["save-all"] = function(event,operation) { var tiddler = event.paramObject.tiddler, field = event.paramObject.field || "text"; if(tiddler && field) { operation.cutStart = 0; operation.cutEnd = operation.text.length; this.wiki.setText(tiddler, field, null, operation.text ); } }; })();"},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/clear":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/clear","caption":"{{$:/core/images/clear}} 清空","condition":"[type[]] [get[type]prefix[text/]] +[first[]]","created":"20240316051826854","description":"清空当前条目内容","icon":"$:/core/images/clear","modified":"20240427032507446","shortcuts":"((clear))","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 清空 按钮","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-text-operation" $param="replace-all" text="" />"},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/create-multiple-tids":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/create-multiple-tids","caption":"{{$:/core/images/newList}} 批量新建条目","created":"20240427062913857","description":"批量新建条目","modified":"20240427063444592","tags":"按list批量创建新条目 按钮 $:/tags/PageControls","text":"\whitespace trim <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="批量新建条目"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/newList|22px}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=批量新建条目/> <$action-navigate $to="批量创建条目数据编辑"/> "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-edit":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-edit","caption":"{{$:/core/images/filter-symbol}} 批量添加筛选器符号-编辑模式","condition":"[type[]] [get[type]prefix[text/]] +[first[]]","created":"20240426015558291","description":"批量添加筛选器符号","icon":"$:/core/images/filter-symbol","modified":"20240427023125463","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 按钮 批量添加筛选器符号","text":"\define temp() $:/temp/filter-symbol \define blank-line() \n <$let lbr=" " pre="[[" suf="]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-text-operation" $param="save-all" tiddler=<> /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-text-operation" $param="replace-all" text={{{ [get[text]splitregexp[\n]] +[addprefix
]+[addsuffix]+[join] }}}
/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> />
"},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-remove-edit":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-remove-edit","caption":"{{$:/core/images/filter-symbol-remove}} 批量移除筛选器符号-编辑模式","condition":"[type[]] [get[type]prefix[text/]] +[first[]]","created":"20240427023008733","description":"批量移除筛选器符号","icon":"$:/core/images/filter-symbol-remove","modified":"20240427023115454","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar 按钮 批量添加筛选器符号 批量移除筛选器符号","text":"\define temp() $:/temp/filter-symbol-remove
\define blank-line() \n

<$let
	lbr="
" pre="[[" suf="]]">
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="save-all"
	tiddler=<>
/>
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="replace-all"
	text={{{ [get[text]splitregexp[\n]] +[removeprefix
]+[removesuffix]+[join] }}}
/>
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> />
"},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-remove-view":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-remove-view","caption":"{{$:/core/images/filter-symbol-remove}} 批量移除筛选器符号-查看模式","created":"20240427023226298","description":"批量移除筛选器符号","modified":"20240427023453852","tags":"按钮 批量添加筛选器符号 $:/tags/ViewToolbar 批量移除筛选器符号","text":"\whitespace trim

]+[removesuffix]+[join] }}}
/>

"},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-view":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/filter-symbol-view","caption":"{{$:/core/images/filter-symbol}} 批量添加筛选器符号-查看模式","created":"20240426021814380","description":"批量添加筛选器符号","modified":"20240427023506291","tags":"按钮 批量添加筛选器符号 $:/tags/ViewToolbar","text":"\whitespace trim

"},"$:/plugins/dyp/batch-new-tiddlers/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/batch-new-tiddlers/history","created":"20250522154208981","modified":"20250522154215213","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":""},"$:/plugins/dyp/batch-new-tiddlers/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/batch-new-tiddlers/readme","created":"20250522154138990","modified":"20250522154157077","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; 按list批量创建新条目"},"$:/plugins/dyp/batch-new-tiddlers/usage":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/batch-new-tiddlers/usage","created":"20250522154159741","modified":"20250522154206317","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":""},"list-move-to-trashbin":{"title":"list-move-to-trashbin","created":"20240427103926765","modified":"20240427104247030","tags":"$:/tags/Macro 删除","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define trashTidName() <>

\define list-move-to-trashbin(tiddler)
<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>has[title]]" variable=ignore> 
<$vars trashTiddler={{{ [<__tiddler__>addprefix[$:/trashbin/]] }}}>
<$wikify name="trashTid" text=<> >
<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>fields[]]" variable="fieldName">
<$action-setfield 
 $tiddler=<>
 $index=<>
 $value={{{[<__tiddler__>get] }}}
/>

<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> tags="$:/tags/trashbin"/>

<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<__tiddler__>> />
<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>has[draft.of]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> />""">
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{[<__tiddler__>get[draft.of]]}}} />
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> /> 



\end
"},"删除字段是否弹出确认提示":{"title":"删除字段是否弹出确认提示","created":"20240427101110494","modified":"20240427101119981","tags":"删除","text":"yes"},"删除条目是否弹出确认提示":{"title":"删除条目是否弹出确认提示","created":"20240427100711457","modified":"20240427101050379","tags":"删除","text":"yes"},"删除标签是否弹出确认提示":{"title":"删除标签是否弹出确认提示","created":"20240427101055835","modified":"20240427101105048","tags":"删除","text":"yes"},"批量创建条目字段fieldnameList":{"title":"批量创建条目字段fieldnameList","created":"20240425121821355","list":"待删除字段1 待删除字段2 待删除字段3","modified":"20240427054729255","tags":"按list批量创建新条目","text":"{{!!list}}"},"批量创建条目字段fieldnameList源数据":{"title":"批量创建条目字段fieldnameList源数据","created":"20240426034541434","modified":"20240427143238878","tags":"按list批量创建新条目","type":"text/css","text":""},"批量创建条目字段内容fieldvalueList":{"title":"批量创建条目字段内容fieldvalueList","created":"20240425121755910","list":"","modified":"20240427054729264","tags":"按list批量创建新条目","text":"{{!!list}}"},"批量创建条目字段内容fieldvalueList源数据":{"title":"批量创建条目字段内容fieldvalueList源数据","created":"20240426034636520","modified":"20240427143238879","tags":"按list批量创建新条目","type":"text/css","text":""},"批量创建条目数据编辑":{"title":"批量创建条目数据编辑","created":"20240425105442987","modified":"20240429074847464","tags":"按list批量创建新条目","text":"{{||按list批量创建新条目按钮-不打开}}

{{||按list批量创建新条目按钮-不打开}}"},"批量创建条目标签tagList":{"title":"批量创建条目标签tagList","code-body":"yes","created":"20240425101704076","modified":"20240427121147203","tags":"按list批量创建新条目","type":"text/css","text":""},"批量创建条目标题newList":{"title":"批量创建条目标题newList","code-body":"yes","created":"20240425101501133","modified":"20240427121147189","tags":"按list批量创建新条目","type":"text/css","text":""},"批量删除字段":{"title":"批量删除字段","created":"20240427052340058","modified":"20240427101404042","tags":"按list批量创建新条目 删除","text":"<$set name="deleteList" value={{批量创建条目标题newList}}>

"},"按list批量创建新条目教程":{"title":"按list批量创建新条目教程","created":"20240427115217607","modified":"20240427115303286","tags":"按list批量创建新条目 教程","text":"用法：

# 在文本框中输入内容，每一项换行或加空格，带空格的项用筛选器符号 `[[]]` 包裹；
# 可点击按钮 {{$:/core/images/filter-symbol|20px}} 或 {{$:/core/images/filter-symbol-remove|20px}}，给每一个换行项批量添加或移除筛选器符号 `[[]]` ；
# 字段名称和字段内容需要一一对应。
# 注意条目标题名称不能重复，否则会新建另一个标题带序号的条目，同时因为条目标题被改变了，追加标签和字段将不会生效。"},"按list批量创建新条目样式css":{"title":"按list批量创建新条目样式css","created":"20240425174040446","modified":"20240427143142382","tags":"按list批量创建新条目 样式 $:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/css","text":".list-tids {
  resize: none; /* 防止用户调整大小 */
  /* 设置边框样式 */
  border: 1px solid #ddd; /* 细边框，颜色浅灰 */
  border-radius: 3px; /* 小的边框圆角 */

  /* 设置尺寸 */
  width: 90%; 
  height: 100px;

  /* 设置内边距 */
  padding: 8px;

  /* 调整背景和文字颜色 */
  background-color: #fff; /* 背景颜色为白色 */
  color: #333; /* 文字颜色为深灰 */

  /* 鼠标悬停和获取焦点时的样式 */
  &:hover, &:focus {
    border-color: #bcbcbc; /* 边框颜色稍微加深 */
    outline: none; /* 去除轮廓线，保持简洁 */
  }

  /* 去掉默认的滚动条，但保留滚动功能 */
  overflow-y: auto; /* 仅当内容超出容器高度时显示滚动条 */
  scrollbar-width: none; /* Firefox 隐藏滚动条 */

  /* Chrome, Safari 和 Opera 隐藏滚动条 */
  &::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
  }
}

.list-tids-btn-all {
  float: right;
  display: flex; 
  justify-content: flex-end; /* 靠右对齐 */
  align-items: center; /* 垂直居中对齐 */
  white-space: nowrap; /* 防止容器内部内容换行 */
  gap: 20px; /* 设置按钮之间的间隔 */
  margin-right: 10%;
}

.list-tids-btn {
  opacity: 0.5;
  transition: opacity 0.3s ease; /* 平滑过渡 */
  -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;
  box-shadow: none;
}

.list-tids-btn:hover {
  opacity: 1;
}

.list-tids-btn-all-left {
  display: inline-block; /* 或者使用 inline-flex */
  white-space: nowrap; /* 防止容器内部内容换行 */
  vertical-align: middle; /* 上下居中对齐 */
}

.list-tids-btn-all-left > * {
  display: inline-block; /* 子元素也使用内联块元素 */
  text-align: left;
  padding-left: 10px;
  padding-right: 10px;
}

.list-tids-btn-all-left > *:first-child {
  padding-left: 20px; /* 第一个元素左边距为0 */
}

.list-tids-btn-all-left > *:last-child {
  padding-right: 0; /* 最后一个元素右边距为0 */
}"},"条目字段fieldnameList-工具栏":{"title":"条目字段fieldnameList-工具栏","created":"20240426033236677","modified":"20240427021409551","tags":"按钮 批量添加筛选器符号","text":"

	lbr="

]+[addsuffix]+[join] }}}
/>

]+[removesuffix]+[join] }}}
/>





<$transclude $variable="clear-text" src="批量创建条目字段fieldnameList源数据" tooltip=清空条目字段fieldnameList/>"},"条目字段内容fieldvalueList-工具栏":{"title":"条目字段内容fieldvalueList-工具栏","created":"20240426034918606","modified":"20240427021511054","tags":"按钮 批量添加筛选器符号","text":"
